FuncDef: This command configures the source address to use in the IP packet of the ping test for this destination.

ParaDef.Info: The source address of the IP packet. This can be IPv4 only for an IPv4 destination and IPv6 only for an IPv6 destination. Values-ipv4-address:|a.b.c.d., ipv6-address: |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces), |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d, |x: [0 to FFFF]H, |d: [0 to 255]D.
